entry.title: Wood Frame Sling Hammock
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type: PWS20XH
Price: 299.00

Description

  • Freestanding stylish curved arc solid wood stand
  • Natural cotton canvas hammock sling
  • Removable canvas for easy storage
  • Easily adjustable hammock hooks allow you to decide how low or high you want to lay
  • Ideal for deck, porch, patio or other outdoor areas
  • Natural variation may occur in the base of this product
  • Easy to assemble

Eye-catching curved solid wood frame sets this Free Standing Sling Hammock apart from the crowd. The larch wood curved stand provides durability and stability and the densely woven cotton hammock is easy to remove for storage. The free-standing design means there is no need for any other support, it’s simple, just place it in your favorite backyard spot and relax!

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 48"H X 124"W X 46"D
Product Weight 46 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 5"H X 62"W X 15"D
Carton Shipping Weight 49 lbs.
Materials Wood, Fabric, Metal
Max Weight 297 lbs.

entry.title: Gallant Reclining Lounger with Cushion
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type: PJR20XL
Price: 449.00

Description

  • Powder coated aluminum/steel hybrid frame to resist rusting
  • Backrest with adjustable positions for optimal experience
  • Weather resistant fabric withstands exposure to the elements
  • Plastic capped feet prevent damage to patio surface
  • Folds for easy, compact storage
  • Low maintenance design is engineered for high durability
  • Easy assembly required

Enjoy some fun in the sun on your patio or porch with this modern patio lounger! Supported by sturdy aluminum, this chaise features a clean-lines that will fit in any outdoor aesthetic. Sporting a neutral-colored cushion that is weather-resistant and filled with foam stuffing that lines the seat and backrest for added comfort, while multiple reclining positions let you choose how to relax. When the season’s over and it’s time to bring them inside, these lounge chairs fold away easily for storage.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 39"H X 26"W X 80"D
Product Weight 18 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 4"H X 67"W X 27"D
Carton Shipping Weight 25 lbs.
Materials Steel, Polyester
Max Weight 262 lbs.

entry.title: Lake Front Patio Gliding Bench
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 254.00

Description

  • Durable, heavy-duty powder-coated steel frame
  • Smooth, easy glide motion
  • Weather-resistant to, rainwater, UV rays, and spills
  • Sturdy steel armrests for support
  • Low maintenance, just wipe clean with a damp cloth
  • Easy assembly

Relax and enjoy your morning coffee in this comfortable dark green glider. The bench frame is made of powder-coated steel and is weather-resistant to last year after year. The slightly curved seat and rocking capabilities allow for ultimate comfort and armrests on each side mean you can sit back and relax in style.

entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type: PRK-27X-L
Price: 449.00

Description

  • Made with galvanized powder coated steel for durability
  • Made using Weather rated PVC for long-lasting enjoyment
  • Cushions are easily removable for storage
  • Handwoven around the entire chair

  • Galvanized powder coated steel helps resist rust

Dreaming of spending your days relaxing in your own private oasis? Look no further. Comfort, design, and style are all found in this sun lounger. Multiple adjustment angles allow you to find that perfect position. Its powder-coated steel frame helps resist rust and its all-weather, UV resistant resin wicker maintains a bright and fresh appearance year after year.

entry.title: Nantucket Patio Swing with Arched Canopy
entry.summary:
Vendor: CorLiving
Type:
Price: 1019.00

Description

  • Durable, weather resistant powder-coated steel frame in warm grey
  • Cushion and shade canopy made of UV resistant Olefin fabric
  • Comfortable 4” foam seat cushion with tufting with foam-topped backrest
  • Patterned fade resistant vinyl mesh seat to support removable cushion
  • Easy to assemble

Relaxing moments in your backyard are made easy with the addition of this patio swing. The sturdy, accented steel frame is complimented by an arched shade canopy, and removable 4” tufted seat cushion with a comfortable foam topped backrest. Made from durable, UV resistant Olefin fabric, this shade-creating canopy and seat cushion are made to withstand the test of time. Gently sway your afternoon away! Only simple assembly needed upon delivery means you can complete your patio in minutes.

Specifications

Assembly Required Yes
Product Dimensions 80"H X 85"W X 62"D
Product Weight 111 lbs.
Carton Shipping Dimensions 11"H X 82"W X 26"D
Carton Shipping Weight 122 lbs.
Materials Metal, Mesh, Fabric, Foam
Max Weight 449 lbs.
